official_title: A Randomized Controlled Trial of eSCCIP: An eHealth Psychosocial Intervention for English and Spanish Speaking Parents of Children With Cancer
inclusion_criteria:
* Participants must be the parent or primary caregiver of a child (ages 0 - 18 years old) diagnosed with cancer.
* Participants must be able to speak and read English or Spanish.
* Participants must have access to the internet through a computer or mobile device (e.g., smartphone, tablet).
Healthy volunteers allowed
exclusion_criteria: * PCCC are ineligible to participate if their child is not expected to live longer than six months from the time of potential recruitment
